attributes.action: Seize Russian oligarch properties within the UK
attributes.additional_details: Russia and it's elite need to see further consequences for these actions.
attributes.background: Seize Russian properties/assets in response to the Russian invasion of Ukraine.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Place the strictest possible sanctions on Russia until it withdraws from Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428

Seize assets held by anyone with close ties to the Russian government: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609418
